metadata.feature_description: Create, read, update, and delete influence scoring goals with 17 predefined goal types for tracking and scoring community interactions.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create new influence goal with valid data

steps.expected: Create form appears with GoalType dropdown, Weight, Value, MinValue, MaxValue fields
steps.actual: Create form appeared with all expected fields and 17 goal type options in dropdown

steps.action: Select 'Average time on page' goal type and fill valid values (Weight=15, Value=60, Min=0, Max=300)

steps.expected: Goal created successfully, appears in list, count increases
steps.actual: Goal created successfully, count increased from 13 to 14 items, 'Average time on page' appeared in list with Weight=15, Value=60

steps.action: Click on 'Average time on page' row to edit
steps.expected: Edit form opens with current values populated
steps.actual: Edit form opened with GoalType='Average time on page', Weight=15, Value=60, MinValue=0, MaxValue=300

steps.action: Change Weight from 15 to 20 and click Save
steps.expected: Goal updated successfully with new Weight value
steps.actual: Goal updated successfully, row now shows Weight=20

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Delete influence goal with confirmation dialog

steps.action: Hover over 'Average time on page' row and click Remove button
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog appears asking to confirm deletion
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' and Cancel/Delete buttons

steps.expected: Goal deleted successfully, removed from list, count decreases
steps.actual: Goal deleted successfully, 'Average time on page' removed from list, count decreased from 14 to 13 items, success message shown

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify required field validation for all fields

steps.action: Click 'Create New' and immediately click Save without filling any fields
steps.expected: Validation errors appear for all required fields
steps.actual: 'Text is required' error messages appeared for Weight, Value, MinValue, and MaxValue fields

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test negative number validation for all numeric fields

steps.action: Enter negative values in all numeric fields (Weight=-5, Value=-10, MinValue=-1, MaxValue=-2) and click Save
steps.expected: Validation errors appear for negative numbers
steps.actual: 'Negative numbers are not allowed' error messages appeared for all four numeric fields

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify MinValue must be less than MaxValue validation

steps.action: Enter Min=100, Max=10 (Min greater than Max) and click Save
steps.expected: Validation error appears indicating Min must be less than Max
steps.actual: Red error indicator appeared showing validation failed for Min/Max constraint

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Value must be between MinValue and MaxValue validation

steps.action: Enter Value=50 with Min=1 and Max=10 (Value outside range) and click Save
steps.expected: Validation error appears indicating Value must be between Min and Max
steps.actual: Red error indicator appeared on Value field showing validation failed for out-of-range value

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Cancel edit operation and verify no changes saved

steps.action: Open edit form for 'Average time on page', change GoalType to 'Total time on site', then click Cancel
steps.expected: Edit form closes without saving changes, original goal remains unchanged
steps.actual: Edit form closed, 'Average time on page' remained in list with original values (Weight=15, Value=60), changes were not saved

steps.action: Try to create a goal with GoalType 'The number of friends the user has' which already exists
steps.expected: Validation error appears indicating duplicate GoalType not allowed
steps.actual: System showed 'Item successfully saved.' message but did not create a duplicate and did not show an error. The existing goal values remained unchanged.

issues: System silently fails when attempting to create duplicate GoalType - shows success message but doesn't save or show proper validation error

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify GoalType is locked after creation

steps.action: Open edit form for existing goal and attempt to change GoalType dropdown
steps.expected: GoalType dropdown should be disabled/locked for existing goals
steps.actual: GoalType dropdown remained enabled and selectable during edit mode - was able to change from 'Average time on page' to 'Total time on site'

issues: GoalType dropdown is not locked/disabled when editing existing influence goals - users can change the GoalType which may cause data integrity issues

steps.action: Observe GoalType dropdown options and how they display in the list
steps.expected: Goals display with human-readable titles derived from GoalType
steps.actual: GoalType dropdown shows 17 predefined goal types with descriptive titles, and these titles are correctly displayed in the goals list

observations: The system has 17 predefined goal types available for influence scoring
Validation error messages appear as red tooltip-style indicators that may require hover/click to see full message
When attempting to create a duplicate GoalType, the system shows success but silently ignores the request - this should show a proper error message
The GoalType dropdown remains editable when editing existing goals, contradicting the expected behavior that GoalType should be locked after creation
The confirmation dialog for deletion provides good UX with Cancel and Delete options
